long_description: For comfort and support on a massive scale, the Therm-a-Rest MondoKing(TM) Sleeping Pad offers a full 4 in. of ultra-responsive, body-contouring foam in a huge pad that's perfect for car camping. Huge mattress offers maximum space and comfort; the XXL version is more than half as wide as a queen-size bed. 4 in. of warm, compliant foam offers comfort no matter where you camp. R-value equals an off-the-charts 11.4; most sleeping pads we sell range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (well insulated). Fabric shell provides next-to-skin softness while the rugged bottom resists punctures wherever you camp. The Therm-a-Rest MondoKing Sleeping Pad compresses to a surprisingly reasonable travel size; stuff sack included.
